title: Validate the field of dream event venue set up
custom_preconds:
Given
Field of dream venue being configured in boxoffice_prod.config with client-id = "mlbose"
AND
Field of dream venue being configured inhttps://github.mlbam.net/Ticketing/tdc-ticket-scan-feed-processor/blob/1412a4d2b4312fd572561f6bbb1853537f5ec9db/src/main/java/com/mlb/ticketing/tdcscanfeedprocessor/TdcScanFeedProcessorApplication.java#L43
custom_steps:
When
Map a mlbose instance TDC event to MLB gamePK (NGE) for that particular team
AND
Purchase ticket in TDC
custom_expected:
Then
Verify the Field of dream event shows up in ticketing client request
AND
Verify the Field of dream event shows up in mlb.com ( schedules, single game ticket, pricing)
AND
BP app shows in Home tab, tickets tab
AND
BP app tickets forwards
AND
The ticket is eligible for MME listing
AND
BP ticket scan and offer 
AND
Verify the ticket scan feed is set to the correct team and venue

https://github.mlbam.net/Ticketing/tdc-ticket-scan-feed-processor/blob/1412a4d2b4312fd572561f6bbb1853537f5ec9db/src/main/java/com/mlb/ticketing/tdcscanfeedprocessor/TdcScanFeedProcessorApplication.java#L43

title: Validate the Sutter Heath Park venue for Athletics
custom_preconds:
https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/VAPI-1356
GIVEN,
I have a new venue for Athletics
custom_steps:
WHEN,
I venue id is changed by updating the BoxOffice config
custom_expected:
THEN,
I see New Ticketing account creation while manually accepting forwarded ticket
AND
I see New Ticketing account creation while auto accepted forwarded ticket
AND
I see Tickets purchased to an existing account with old venue should see in new Venue
AND
I see Ticket summary (notdes) matched with other tickets from different team
AND
I see Ticket details (notdes) matched with other tickets from different team
AND
I see upcoming ticket details (notdes) matched with other tickets from different team
AND
I see Admin2 Ticket display update
AND
I see apple pass created
AND
I see apple pass auto update when gamePK change in stats
AND
I see tickets details using BoxOffice V3 apis
AND
I am able to list the tickets in MME market
AND
I see default defaultCoordinates VAPI-1228
